title: Scrub Who Only Plays ARAM and AI Anymore Drops $60 on LoL RNG

embed.description: Scrub who only plays AI and ARAM spends $60 on League RNG

body: Gunna buy and open a bunch of capsules for the memes. Come join in on the RNG fun and see what garbage or god tier shit i can pull from the RNG crack that is lootboxes.
